True to size.  Comfortable and fashionable.  Color is true to picture as well.
Great quality and color for the price. I just wish xs was a choice
This is my favorite go to cropped jacket! A lulu lemon dupe. It’s so thick and soft and the hood is so big!
Love the color and thickness of the hoodie. My only complaint is the location of the pockets which are too far back.
Very cute and durable dupe. My daughter loves this more than the name brand.

It was almost a bit big, but it is more cropped so maybe that’s why people said it was small. Quality is thick.. but the color coffee looks almost like an army green in pic but it’s VERY brown in person. Not what I wanted so going to probably exchange.

I like this hoodie a lot.I am petite and I can barely found suitable clothes for exercise and daily activities.It’s not long which makes me look taller and show my shape really well .I bought 4 different colors already but like the green and pink color most. Nearly identical to the super expensive name brand. It’s a nice thick material and feels so soft. Will definitely buy more colors.

Thick fits like a oversized sweatshirt!

This was so cute and cozy looking. I got it for my granddaughter size extra large. Glad I did. It fit her perfectly. She usually wears like a large and the color is so pleasing. We definitely recommend this.

Overall really happy with the quality of this sweatshirt for the price. True to size, a bit boxy & cropped. The fit is similar to higher end brands and the fabric is thick and warm. My only issue is that the thumbholes in the cuffs were weirdly tiny? I had to cut them a bit wider to be able to actually fit my thumbs into them. Otherwise it’s great.

So comfortable and cozy. Bought it to wear in snow but also wearing on cool mornings. Good quality and washes well. I was worried it would shrink when accidentally placed in dryer however the quality held up and it never shrunk or deformed.
Soft, warm, comfortable.
good thickness and pretty pink color but the zipper is extremely poor quality, hard to zip and worsens over time. Would not purchase again.

I am very pleased with this zip up hoodie.  I'm 4' 11" and have a slim upper body and the jacket fits well. I purchased the light grey color.  Will likely purchase another color.

This is a nice jacket and material is good quality. Not very stretchy. It was shorter than expected but still comfortable for a more cropped fit. I bought a medium and was hoping for a loser fit but would need to size up.

I give the material a 10/10. Style is very much like the lulu lemon scuba sip up sweatshirt. I love it. The only thing I don’t like is that it has a grey plastic zipper track, and a silver zipper. The zipper track looks cheap, I don’t know why they didn’t just use an actual silver zipper track.

So thick, good quality. The length is perfect, not too cropped
good quality

I was trying to replace the exact sweatshirt I ordered before in heather grey because the zipper kept falling off in the wash. The other sweathirt (beige) hasn't had this problem. Upon receiving it in October from when I originally ordered them in the spring, the style and thickness had changed...the seam isn't as high up in the front as what the picture and previous style shows and was, plus it wasn't as thick. Both of these has left me frustrated and annoyed, sending it back yet again. Yes, you get what you pay for, but it's false advertisement from what the pictures show versus what you actually get. Do not recommend getting this sweatshirt now.
I love everything about this!  Sad it doesn't have pockets or else I'd give it 5 stars!
